fever.advice: Rest, hydrate, and take paracetamol. Seek help if fever exceeds 102Â°F or lasts more than 3 days.

cough.advice: Try steam inhalation and warm fluids. Persistent coughs need medical evaluation.

headache.advice: Rest in a quiet space and stay hydrated. Use pain relief if needed.

sore throat.advice: Gargle with warm salt water and use lozenges. See a doctor if fever is high.

dengue.advice: Avoid NSAIDs and seek immediate medical care. Stay hydrated and monitor for bleeding.

covid-19.advice: Isolate, monitor oxygen levels, and consult a doctor if symptoms worsen.

cold.advice: Rest, fluids, and steam inhalation help. Avoid antibiotics unless prescribed.

migraine.advice: Avoid triggers, rest in a dark room, and use prescribed medication.

diarrhea.advice: Use ORS and avoid spicy foods. Seek help if symptoms persist.

skin rash.advice: Use soothing creams and avoid scratching. See a dermatologist if rash spreads.
